lead_paragraph: The shooting, the highest-profile attack against an army official since 2013, was thought to be linked to the officer’s role in destroying tunnels used by Hamas.

headline.print_headline: Egyptian Army Officer  Shot Dead Outside Home
headline.main: Egyptian Army Officer Killed Outside Home; Militant Group Is Suspected

snippet: The shooting, the highest-profile attack against an army official since 2013, was thought to be linked to the officer’s role in destroying tunnels used by Hamas....
